At 01:38 PM 29/11/01, you wrote:
>Now that the good folks of this list have assisted me in obtaining the
>standard out of the java object that I was testing, I have one further
>question.
>
>What is the prevailing best practice for testing the output when it has
>different end-of-line markers from different operating systems? My
>lovely new tests are failing on Microsoft Windows!


System.getProperty("line.separator") could well help...
